comments: A watchpoint should be updated (recreated) when the field it is watch is renamed.

Done.
Changes in jdt.debug.ui plugin.xml, added classes
JavaWatchpointIFieldRenameParticipant and JavaWatchpointFieldNameChange.
I think you need jdt.ui from head to be able to test.

I fixed a problem there was when trying to undo the refactoring after the
watchpoint had been deleted. It now correctly fails.

Updated an other time.
I fixed bug 54859 and switch back to the first implementation.
Please verify, Darin S.
